name: Shivam Khule
subject: Enrollment Confirmation - COMPLETE 3-MONTH PROGRAM
message:
Enrollment Confirmation

Dear Shivam Khule,

Thank you for enrolling in our program. Here are the details of your enrollment:

Program Details

  • Program: COMPLETE 3-MONTH PROGRAM
  • Batch ID: batch-4
  • Start Date: Dec 10, 2025
  • End Date: Mar 10, 2026
  • Timings: Sat & Sun, 2:00 PM - 4:00 PM
  • Mode: Hybrid
  • Instructor: Alex Morgan

Program Overview

Duration: 12 Weeks

Daily Time Commitment: 60 Minutes/Day

Practical Content: 95%

Program Structure

Month 1 - Communication & Confidence

  • Week 1: Fluency, Expression & Everyday English
  • Week 2: Business English & Writing Power
  • Week 3: Pronunciation, Accent, Voice & Clarity
  • Week 4: Presentation Mastery

Month 2 - Career Growth & Workplace Intelligence

  • Week 5: Interview Domination (Master Week 1)
  • Week 6: Resume, LinkedIn & Branding
  • Week 7: Workplace Intelligence & Leadership Basics
  • Week 8: Negotiation, Productivity & Career Planning

Month 3 - Personality, EQ, Leadership & AI

  • Week 9: Personality & Confidence Upgrade
  • Week 10: Emotional Intelligence & Assertiveness
  • Week 11: Critical Thinking & Creativity
  • Week 12: AI for Communication & Career (Master Week 2)

Program Deliverables

  • Daily WhatsApp Micro-Learning
  • Gamification System
  • Success Vault (templates, prompts, scripts)
  • 3 Personalized Feedback Videos
  • 30-Day Post-Program Follow-Up
  • Full Portfolio (Resume, LinkedIn, Intro Video, Presentation)

Next Steps

  1. Please check your email for payment instructions.
  2. You will receive joining instructions 24 hours before the program starts.
  3. Download our mobile app for daily micro-learning sessions.

If you have any questions, please contact us at info@softskillmentor.com

Best regards,
The SoftSkill Mentor Academy Team
